attributes.action: make all benefits and tax credits only availiable to support people living in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have recently heard about many foreigners who are currenly working/living in the UK who are claiming benefits and tax credits to support not only themselves here in the UK but also for their families living in other countries. I believe that benefits should only be availiable to support people currently resident in the UK. Foreign families living in a different country should apply for benefits from their own government.

Of course British citizens who are currently working abroad for a UK organisation (e.g. the Army) should still be entitled to benefits etc. the same as they would be if they were still resident in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
